load_data.json_critique: Only requires reading an existing HDF5 file and computing percentiles; it does not engage with any of the paper’s modelling or inference.
paper_critique: Aside from one trivial data-extraction task, all other tasks faithfully require re-implementing the paper’s hierarchical Bayesian framework, selection-bias calculation, and simulation pipeline.  They collectively cover the core results (M_TOV, M_BH, mass-gap probability, projections, spin–mass relation).  Minor simplifications (e.g. fixed a_Kep, limited EOS variations) keep the total complexity just short of the paper’s full scope.
paper_title: Inferring the neutron star maximum mass and lower mass gap in neutron star--black hole systems with spin
